message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in this product, $1100000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $950000. This is a fair price considering your desired selling point and my budget.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
